author: dahinn
post_text: January 20, 2024 at 11:39â€¯AM#1Hello, I'm looking for a way to assign a value to an attribute in range of 0 thru 255.Sure, I can type something like this:Fixture 1 Attribute "pan" at [0 thru 100] - [0 thru 100] means percent values,orFixture 1 Attribute "pan" at [-270 thru 270] - [-270 thru 270] means the pan rotation degree of the fixture 1.But I want to assign the exact value of the dmx signal - [0 thru 255].Can anybody help me ?
title: Assigning a value to an attribute
